comments.content: Any idea what type of font and name?

It looks like **[IFC RAILROAD (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20141101163048/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=IFC%20RAILROAD%20-%20Bold&fid=6fdd994a9021f774c28bf56fb5f75635&fsize=60&text=WETHERSFIELD&fit=1)** by Anton Krylov [Free for personal use]
